description: This file contains implementations of classes and methods related to parsing text and file paths within the Core namespace of the WPEFramework project. It provides functionality to read text fragments, parse file paths, and extract components like drive, filename, extension, and path.

classes.name: TextParser
classes.description: Class responsible for parsing text fragments with methods to read text according to delimiters

classes.name: PathParser
classes.description: Class designed to parse file paths into components such as drive, filename, extension, and path

methods.name: uint32_t ReadText(const TCHAR delimiters[],const uint32_t offset) const
methods.description: Reads text until a delimiter or quote is found, returning the endpoint index

methods.name: ReadText (overload)
methods.description: Reads a text fragment into an optional result based on delimiters

methods.name: void Parse(const TextFragment & input)
methods.description: Parses a file path into its components: drive, path, filename, extension

ctags.name: ReadText
ctags.pattern: /^    uint32_t TextParser::ReadText(const TCHAR delimiters[], const uint32_t offset) const$/
